thread.title: BRIEF-Time Warner Q4 Adjusted Earnings Per Share $2.66

title: BRIEF-Time Warner Q4 Adjusted Earnings Per Share $2.66
text:
Feb 1 (Reuters) - Time Warner Inc:
* REPORTS FOURTH-QUARTER AND FULL-YEAR 2017 RESULTS * QTRLY REVENUES GREW 9% TO $8.6 BILLION * Q4 ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE $2.66 * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE $1.75 * QTRLY TURNER REVENUES INCREASED 10% ($285 MILLION) TO $3.1 BILLION
* TIME WARNER - QTRLY EARNINGS PER SHARE, ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE INCLUDE TAX PROVISION BENEFIT OF $1.06 RELATED TO U.S. TAX REFORM
* QTRLY WARNER BROS REVENUES INCREASED 5% ($185 MILLION) TO $4.1 BILLION
* QTRLY HOME BOX OFFICE REVENUES INCREASED 13% ($189 MILLION) TO $1.7 BILLION
* HOME BOX OFFICE FOURTH-QUARTER REVENUES INCREASED 13% ($189 MILLION) TO $1.7 BILLION
* TIME WARNER - “WE REMAIN EXCITED ABOUT PROPOSED MERGER WITH AT&T, PENDING JUDICIAL REVIEW”
* Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $1.43, REVENUE VIEW $8.42 BILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
